definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
catty/(PRC) weight equal to 500 g/(Tw) weight equal to 600 g/(HK, Malaysia, Singapore) slightly over 604 g
Rice (name)/Condoleezza Rice (1954-) US Secretary of State 2005-2009
Abbas (name)/Mahmoud Abbas (1935-), also called Abu Mazen, Palestinian leader, Chairman of the Palestinian National Authority (PNA) from 2005
Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]

sentences.english: One day Mrs. Slaton gave the class an assignment.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，斯萊頓夫人給全班同學佈置了一項作業。

sentences.english: I do not know why I've even come, " he commented to Krasus."
sentences.chinese: “我不知道我爲什麼會來，”他向克拉蘇斯提意見。

sentences.english: Mr. Alvarez has not yet been called to testify.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾瓦雷斯尚未被法庭傳喚作證。

sentences.english: Cowart and schlesselman are scheduled to appear before a judge on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 斯科萊瑟爾曼和科瓦特將於星期三出庭受審。

sentences.english: The coach substituted Smith for Jones.
sentences.chinese: 教練讓史密斯上場，換下了鍾斯。

sentences.english: AT seven-thirty Friday evening Scali passed this word along.
sentences.chinese: 星期五晚上七時半，斯卡利把話傳了過去。

sentences.english: Spoelstra, however, seemed to miss the most relevant point.
sentences.chinese: 但是，看起來斯波爾斯特拉錯過了那個最關鍵的問題。

sentences.english: Judge Stephens allowed no foolishness when he held court.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂芬斯法官開庭時不允許人胡來。

sentences.english: This also marked the first season played in the newly built Staples Center.
sentences.chinese: 這同時也是新建成的斯臺普斯中心的第一個賽季。

sentences.english: The Caribbean waters there are also perfect for scuba diving.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的加勒比海域也非常適合進行斯庫巴潛水。

sentences.english: The only guy who was hard to get to know was Richie Gaspari.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的傢伙誰是很難了解的是裏奇斯帕裏。

sentences.english: The Atkins Diet is a departure from the previously prevailingmetabolic theories.
sentences.chinese: 阿特金斯飲食偏離了以前流行的新陳代謝理論。

sentences.english: Ms Mastenbroek said that behind your elbows and knees are also great points for perfume.
sentences.chinese: 馬斯滕布魯克女士表示，手肘和膝蓋也是不錯的位置。

sentences.english: Benitez, the objective is 6 titles. But will he be better than Mou?
sentences.chinese: 貝尼特斯，目標是6冠王。但他能做的比穆更好麼？

sentences.english: I also asked Jeff to talk to Colonel Holmes.
sentences.chinese: 我也請求傑夫與霍爾姆斯上校談談。

definition: Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
